.. code-block:: rst
   :caption: Book basic template

   ###############################################################################
   Book's Title
   ###############################################################################

   .. contents::
      :depth: 1
      :local:
      :backlinks: entry

   .. toctree::
      :caption: chapter_x
      :maxdepth: 1
      :glob:

      *


.. code-block:: rst
   :caption: Chapter basic template

   *******************************************************************************
   Chapter
   *******************************************************************************
    
   .. contents::
      :depth: 1
      :local:
      :backlinks: entry

   This is a Section
   =================

   This is a Sub-Section
   ---------------------

   This is a Sub-Sub-Section
   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

   This is a Paragraph
   """""""""""""""""""
